text: Chellamadi Nee Enakku ( You are My Sweetie}}) is a 2006 Indian Tamil-language soap opera that was aired on Sun TV. The show premiered on 11 December 2006. It aired Start this December 11, 2006 to September 5, 2008 Monday through Friday. The show stars Ajay Kapoor, Gayathri Priya, Sri Devi, Krithiga, Vadivukkarasi and Devi Priya. The show is produced by Abhinaya Creations Radha Krishnan and director by S.N Sakthi Vel. The show last aired on 5 September 2008 and ended with 400 episodes. ==Cast== ===Main cast=== * Ajay as Siva (Antagonist) * Gayathri Priya as Parvathi * Kritika Krishnan / Sandhya / Sridevi Ashok as Meena * Devi Priya as Eswari * Nesan as Chandra Balaji ===Recurring cast=== * Vincent Roy * Dr. Sharmila / Krithiga as Shylaja * Rajasekar * Vadivukkarasi *Sai Latha *Priya * Chokkalingam *Nithya Ravindran * Banumathi * Abishek * Azhagu * Rao Ramesh * P. R. Varalakshmi * Sandhya Jagarlamudi * Minnal Deepa as Manju ==Broadcast== The series aired Monday through Friday in Sri Lanka on the Tamil-language channel Vasantham TV. ==See also== * List of programs broadcast by Sun TV ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Sun TV television series Category:Tamil- language television soap operas Category:2006 Tamil-language television series debuts Category:Tamil-language television shows Category:2008 Tamil-language television series endings Category:2000s Tamil-language television series
title: Chellamadi Nee Enakku
